channel.title: RuneDestiny 508 [ Fight pits ll CastleWars ll
channel.description:
Read this before anything else First of all, I don't want to create a private server for money, or for popularity. If you're looking for that, then don't bother applying. I simply want to build an fun server from where it is now; nothing; scratch; just moving, rendering, login, chat, and multi-player features. Also, I'm not as stuck-up as I seem right now. I just don't want a bunch of little kids applying when they probably can't even use an IDE correctly, nonetheless program, and another thing. If your programming skills stretch to only double-clicking a batch file, or using the ctrl-f function, then don't bother applying.
Requirements: Don't think of these as requirements! Just what we want you to have -- capable of doing, etc Items with a following * are required
Team viewer (You won't necessarily need this if you have a good explanation) Windows Live Messenger *Skype *An FTP client *The JDK, and an IDE * COMPETENCE
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Now for the actual introduction. PlanRune is'nt a proper server yet, we don't have the components,yet, for a "perfect" server, all we ask from you (that is if you're going to apply) is just to be COMPETENT with your programming language of choice, and if you are, welcome to the development team!
Another thing: I am not going to "test" you in any sort of way, some of you are probably better than me in programming, and maybe not, but I am competent with Java, and wish to continue using it.
Another thing: I am not going to sit back and watch any of my fellow developers do all of the work. I plan to keep building on it until the team has agreed that it is finished. And then we publicly host the server. Also, I am not going to make anyone pay for anything. I am hosting it on a dedicated server or VPS. The development team will have privileges to use the server as well, along with privileges using the FTP to transfer files to the web server, and obtaining the server files.
And another thing: We don't care how old you are! Just please refer to the paragraphs above before applying. We could care less if you are 9. We will still respect you. the only important thing is that if you can code or not. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Information
Privileges: I may have mentioned this already..but... All development team members will have full privileges. I don't give two shits if the person in the team is just a community manager, or doing scripting; everyone gets the same privileges as everyone else. (Even me).
[b]Our goals:[/b] To make an excellent, stable, and fun server. To get players on the server that STAY & PLAY in it. To make the construction skill work 100% percent. To add various minigames to the server like clanwars, pest control, etc. Fix the HUGE glitches and bugs the server contains.
The Team (so far!) Cns - the owner (me!) beautiful - head admin FMTV pain - 2nd owner and server coder Tyler - 2nd server coder & 3rd owner
What we need: [b]Game Developers, a.k.a coders Web Developer, a.k.a website designer Community Management, a.k.a staff GFX designer Client coder Hiscores maker Webclient maker[/b]
Position Descriptions: [s]Game Developer - [b]this includes further development of the game; client&server-sided, a.k.a coders[/b][/s] Tyler & FWTV pain
Web Developer - [b]this includes further development of the website, a.k.a website designer[/b]
Community Management - [b]this includes player support, and forum/community management, in all subjects, a.k.a staff [/b] ===> till now, FMTV pain,beautiful, and Tyler
GFX designer - [b]somebody who knows how to make banners by using any designing program like photoshop or something like that[/b]
Client coder - [b]somebody who codes up clients by adding models to them or change the login screen, etc.[/b]
Hiscores maker - [b]includes someone who adds hiscores to the server so people can compete against each other to get the throne of glory[/b]
Webclient maker - [b]includes a person who makes a webclient to the players without having to download the client, in other words "internet client"[/b]
Applications: You come up with one!
But we will need: Your name! Your contact address (email) Your live messenger email (this can also be the contact address) Your timezone
Please don't apply with the only the items listed above. Go into depth, tell us who you are, what you've done, or anything else.
And one last thing.....
Our features (till now) :
100% working GE (Grand Exchange) 100% working duel arena 100% GWD 100% working Straight champion quest 100% working castle wars minigame 100% working bounty hunter minigame 100% working Jad minigame (drops Fire cape) 100% working defender minigame 100% working fight pits 100% working skill cape emotes 100% working summoning 100% working crafting 100% working runecrafting 100% working smelting 100% working slayer 100% working theiving 100% working fishing 100% working cooking 100% working mining 100% working woodcutting 100% working firemaking 100% working fletching 100% working agility 100% working prayer 100% working clanchat (also promoting players to lieutenant and such ranks working) 100% working splitchat Perfect KBD Perfect Chaos Elemental Perfect Flawless Combat Perfect DFS spec Perfect Clothing boothes AWESOME new bank tabs Dragonfire shield Shantay Pass all godsword specs working (bandos, saradomin, armadyl, and zamorak) PKpoints system with shop added new veng with correct GFX's veng other beautifully working Pali based and much, much more you can find in our server!
[size=24pt]some pics[/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/Gra.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/cw-1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/duel-1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/clan.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/clan2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/lol.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/map-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/mg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/boun.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/min-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd366/cns78/proof-1.jpg[/img]
[size=24pt]ADDING MORE SOON![/size]
CREDITS (till now!) i str str - for the great customs pack he made Z O D I A C - for the great pack he released Tyler - Hosting & coding our server FWTV_pain - Coding our server & making his freind help us

item.description:
@mr_wizzard wrote:

What you need:
Game Developers, a.k.a coders
Web Developer, a.k.a website designer
Community Management, a.k.a staff
GFX designer
Client coder
Hiscores maker
Webclient maker

what i can do

web development: i know html, css, javascript, and php w/ mysql
Highscores: i’ve done it before but it was kind of buggy
webclient maker: this comes second hand to me i was constantly updating an old server i was webmaster on webclient. i know how to edit it and jar it and how to pack cache.
Community Management, a.k.a staff: in my time as staff i have never been reported for abusing for that matter i have never abused. i also love putting on community events

i have refferals msn me for them…

Your name: patrick (not putting last name on
Your contact address (email): monkeypa@hotmail.com
Your live messenger email (this can also be the contact address) same as above
Your timezone: west coast.

item.title: RuneDestiny 508 [ Fight pits ll CastleWars ll
item.dc:creator: @Tyler_BloodLust Tyler - BloodLust
item.description:
@Tyler_BloodLust wrote:

[quote=“ritzlove, post:1, topic:375277”]Read this before anything else
First of all, I don’t want to create a private server for money, or for popularity. If you’re looking for that, then don’t bother applying. I simply want to build an fun server from where it is now; nothing; scratch; just moving, rendering, login, chat, and multi-player features. Also, I’m not as stuck-up as I seem right now. I just don’t want a bunch of little kids applying when they probably can’t even use an IDE correctly, nonetheless program, and another thing. If your programming skills stretch to only double-clicking a batch file, or using the ctrl-f function, then don’t bother applying. PS I LIKE MENNNN IN MY BUTTT!!

Requirements:
Don’t think of these as requirements! Just what we want you to have – capable of doing, etc
Items with a following * are required

Team viewer (You won’t necessarily need this if you have a good explanation)
Windows Live Messenger
*Skype
*An FTP client
*The JDK, and an IDE

  • COMPETENCE

Now for the actual introduction.
PlanRune is’nt a proper server yet, we don’t have the components,yet, for a “perfect” server, all we ask from you (that is if you’re going to apply) is just to be COMPETENT with your programming language of choice, and if you are, welcome to the development team!

Another thing: I am not going to “test” you in any sort of way, some of you are probably better than me in programming, and maybe not, but I am competent with Java, and wish to continue using it.

Another thing: I am not going to sit back and watch any of my fellow developers do all of the work. I plan to keep building on it until the team has agreed that it is finished. And then we publicly host the server. Also, I am not going to make anyone pay for anything. I am hosting it on a dedicated server or VPS. The development team will have privileges to use the server as well, along with privileges using the FTP to transfer files to the web server, and obtaining the server files.

And another thing:
We don’t care how old you are! Just please refer to the paragraphs above before applying. We could care less if you are 9. We will still respect you. the only important thing is that if you can code or not.

Information

Privileges:
I may have mentioned this already…but…
All development team members will have full privileges. I don’t give two shits if the person in the team is just a community manager, or doing scripting; everyone gets the same privileges as everyone else. (Even me).

Our goals:
To make an excellent, stable, and fun server.
To get players on the server that STAY & PLAY in it.
To make the construction skill work 100% percent.
To add various minigames to the server like clanwars, pest control, etc.
Fix the HUGE glitches and bugs the server contains.

The Team (so far!)
Cns - the owner (me!)
beautiful - head admin

What we need:
Game Developers, a.k.a coders
Web Developer, a.k.a website designer
Community Management, a.k.a staff
GFX designer
Client coder
Hiscores maker
Webclient maker

Position Descriptions:
Game Developer - this includes further development of the game; client&server-sided, a.k.a coders

Web Developer - this includes further development of the website, a.k.a website designer

Community Management - this includes player support, and forum/community management, in all subjects, a.k.a staff

GFX designer - somebody who knows how to make banners by using any designing program like photoshop or something like that

Client coder - somebody who codes up clients by adding models to them or change the login screen, etc.

Hiscores maker - includes someone who adds hiscores to the server so people can compete against each other to get the throne of glory

Webclient maker - includes a person who makes a webclient to the players without having to download the client, in other words “internet client”

Applications:
You come up with one!

But we will need:
Your name!
Your contact address (email)
Your live messenger email (this can also be the contact address)
Your timezone

Please don’t apply with the only the items listed above. Go into depth, tell us who you are, what you’ve done, or anything else.

And one last thing…

Our features (till now) :

100% working GE (Grand Exchange)
100% working duel arena
100% GWD
100% working Straight champion quest
100% working castle wars minigame
100% working bounty hunter minigame
100% working Jad minigame (drops Fire cape)
100% working defender minigame
100% working fight pits
100% working skill cape emotes
100% working summoning
100% working crafting
100% working runecrafting
100% working smelting
100% working slayer
100% working theiving
100% working fishing
100% working cooking
100% working mining
100% working woodcutting
100% working firemaking
100% working fletching
100% working agility
100% working prayer
100% working clanchat (also promoting players to lieutenant and such ranks working)
100% working splitchat
Perfect KBD
Perfect Chaos Elemental
Perfect Flawless Combat
Perfect DFS spec
Perfect Clothing boothes
AWESOME new bank tabs
Dragonfire shield
Shantay Pass
all godsword specs working (bandos, saradomin, armadyl, and zamorak)
PKpoints system with shop added
new veng with correct GFX’s
veng other beautifully working
Pali based
and much, much more you can find in our server!

[size=24pt]some pics[/size]










proof-1.jpg1020×198

[size=24pt]ADDING MORE SOON![/size]

CREDITS (till now!)
i str str - for the great customs pack he made
Z O D I A C - for the great pack he released[/quote]

Well, its a fine source an all, but you still need some help in fixing your character login. When you login, your previous acc was saved but never gets reloaded…

Read full topic
